jobRecommendations.reasoning: The candidate has internship experience as a Front-End Intern and possesses skills in HTML/CSS, which are fundamental for this role. The projects listed (Weather Forecast Application, Netflix Clone Platform, Personal Portfolio Website, Task Manager Application) demonstrate practical application of these skills. The education in B.Tech provides a solid foundation. The stated aspiration as a Full Stack Web Developer also aligns well, suggesting a desire to grow in this area.

thresholdScore.detailedAnalysis: The candidate demonstrates a good foundation in front-end skills (HTML/CSS) and has relevant project experience. The internship experience, while brief, is a positive indicator. The B.Tech degree is relevant, though the specific field isn't specified. The candidate's interest in full-stack development and AI suggests a strong potential for growth, but further assessment of their front-end proficiency is recommended.
